sentence: And in Pennsylvanias GOP race for governor, Trump's endorsed candidate, the far-right Doug Mastriano, easily won the nomination though he was already well ahead in the polls when Trump weighed in just days before the primary.

sentence: In Pennsylvania, Doug Mastriano, a leading voice against certifying the 2020 election, won the primary for governor in a landslide last week even as the party's old guard warned that he was too extreme to win in November.
